title: Population density patterns in three maps

content.question:
POPULATION DENSITY PATTERNS

Source: Esri

Which of the following identifies how population density is shown in the maps?

choices.label: At different scales, showing administrative units
In different types of physical regions
In different types of culture regions
In different types of vernacular regions
At the same scale, showing different parts of the country

content.answer: At different scales, showing administrative units

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify the different types of data presented in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data.
